name: Elijah Paulman
title: Software Engineer specializing in AI/ML | Graduated Dec 2025

about.short: I am a Computer Science & Engineering graduate from The Ohio State University (December 2025) specializing in AI/ML. I have production experience at Amazon and London Computer Systems building scalable applications with a focus on intelligent automation.
about.detailed: At Amazon, I automated catalog systems managing over 13,000 items, achieving 60% efficiency gains. At LCS, I built REST APIs serving over 100,000 users. I have developed AI-powered applications using LangChain and OpenAI APIs, led 20+ engineers as ESW President, and won multiple J.P. Morgan hackathons.

hobbies: I enjoy playing guitar, mountain biking, skiing, kayaking, and spending time with friends and family. I also like to create cool projects on my 3D printer, and with Arduino.
